ygData.subject: RE: Broken Song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually I d say this is the case regarding testing in general, not just bard testing.  Its merely more amplified since no one plays bards regularly on the
ygData.messageBody:
>If (and I'm not sure it would be worth it yet) bards are going to
>protest with a sit in, it should be over the testing issue, not this
>specific incident. It really looks like either they don't have someone
>at Verant who "owns" bards, both from a programming and testing
>standpoint, or if they do, it's someone who is incompetent or doesn't
>care.
Actually I'd say this is the case regarding testing in general, not just
bard testing. Its merely more amplified since no one plays bards regularly
on the team. I have seen zero evidence they ever test anything, and much
evidence to the contrary. They seem to have the typical old school (and I
mean really old, like 25+ years ago) mentality of, "Hey it compiled ok.
Testing complete."

Kitasi
